captions.text: Do you know when you were a child and you lose for somebody in the school
And then you called your older brother to defend you?
It's what I am doing here today
So, Gerson was the fastest at 'Fast Lap' with Rubinho in the Jaguar
I brought a 911 Turbo to equal the things
I think will be tough to the Jaguar, because Porsche is synonymous of good traction
Always a very good car to transfer horsepower to the wheels
This 911 looks like will beat the time, isn't?
I will be honest with you
When I arrived in Ferrari,
When you are a Ferrari driver in F1 you have the privilege and the obligation of have a Ferrari
Hold on, let me say: required to have a Ferrari
But continue
Tough life!
Yeah, but it's hard, you have to have a Ferrari
But my dream was always to have a 911
A part from that, think this car is very well balanced and have a good engine
And the shape of this car, man...
You see the sportiveness
Yeah, this big entry here
911 is known for a very long time
I will be a little bit jealousy now because I will not be in the car
But go!
Let's see in the track!
Look, the only thing that I wanna do for us here
They said that is just press the brake and accelerates everything
The head goes backwards
Yeah, this is launch control!
Very good
A toy of 1 million reais
It's an expensive toy
When I said that I would like to have a car like this one...
Everyone wanna have this one!
Yeah, I'm just one more
Rubinho, some people say that Porsche have the engine in the wrong place
In theory, if you wanna do a high performance car, you can't put the engine behind the rear axle
What this change in the performance?
Theory versus reality, you can put something of a F1 every car
If you think about this, you can remember the engine of this car, the aerodynamic of Audi
A lot of things
In the reality, Porsche have an insane power, accelerates a lot
And the gravity center is not so high, so you have a good balance
It's the top of line, isn't?
Yeah, the top
I guess, if this one won't be the best car of 'Fast Lap' here...
Will be one of the most entertaining
The most entertaining, for sure
Let's feel the machine now!
This noise is very characteristic
I'm a MotoGP rider now, I'm having to throw my body to the inside
Look how it brakes
Porsche is famous also because of that, the weight is behind
So it's easier to brake because you don't have a lot of weight in the front
Look, the car oversteers, but you don't have to correct a lot
This is awesome
Why?
Because the car is very well balanced, so he starts to oversteer, look my hand
Look
Yeah, you don't move a lot
Yeah, the car have a lot of grip
Grass here
Spoiling Velo Città but it's for a good cause
But is very good this car
The most incredible thing about this car, a part from the power that we are talking, it's launch control
Think will make the difference in 'Fast lap'
I think also
We have in some cars and in others not
'Fast Lap' is like this
So, this we have to put this extra here
This device, this plus, we have to put
We will use, but this start can give to this car a 0.5s at least
I think this can put the car on top
And I will take from Gerson the lead in 'Fast Lap'
'Fast Lap with Rubens Barrichello'
With the good traction putting the whole power on the floor, the 911 Turbo was a lot better than the rest
And It's the new leader of the 'Fast Lap' here in Acelerados
Wow, man! But what about the grass that I caught there?
Beautiful, great!
But the worst is that I didn't talk too much
I didn't had what to say, because a I was...
Nah, you were concentrated

Abraço a todos.
Barrichello sempre te admirei e mais ainda agora com a proximidade das 
redes sociais.﻿
